TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示充当子元素集合的容器的控件。

span.span: Represents controls that act as containers for a collection of child elements.

summary.span: 此控件的子级支持 ，而且必须组织在一个可以按行和列进行遍历的二维逻辑坐标系中。

span.span: The children of this control support and are organized in a two-dimensional logical coordinate system that can be traversed by row and column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不支持 active 的网格; 的操作控件模式，才能使用此功能。 does not support active manipulation of a grid; the control pattern is required for this functionality. 请参阅[UI 自动化客户端的控件模式映射](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md)有关的可能支持此控件模式的控件示例。See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) for examples of controls that may support this control pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cached As GridPattern.GridPatternInformation

summary.span: 获取此 中已缓存的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 一个结构，它包含控件模式中已缓存的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存的属性值必须已以前请求过使用。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用来获取属性的当前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 请求的属性不在缓存中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly ColumnCountProperty As AutomationProperty

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在以下示例中，对返回的 UI 自动化元素的子代的根并符合一组属性条件的集合的函数传递根元素。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of UI Automation elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

summary.span: 获取此 的当前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 一个结构，它包含此控件模式的当前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必须从与以获取当前值的引用。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果获得使用，它只包含已缓存数据，并尝试获取的任何属性的当前值引发异常。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用来获取一个属性，以前使用指定的缓存的值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement GetItem(int32 row, int32 column) cil managed
Public Function GetItem (row As Integer, column As Integer) As AutomationElement

span.span: The ordinal number of the row of interest.
The ordinal number of the column of interest.

summary.span: 检索表示指定单元格的 。

span.span: Retrieves an that represents the specified cell.
An that represents the retrieved cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 网格坐标是从零开始的左上角单元格 （或右上角单元格，具体取决于区域设置） 的坐标 (0，0)。Grid coordinates are zero-based with the upper left (or upper right cell depending on locale) having coordinates (0,0). 如果某个单元格为空，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素仍会返回才可支持检索该单元格的属性。If a cell is empty, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is still returned in order to support retrieval of the property for that cell. 当在网格中的子元素的布局类似于未对齐的数组如此处所示时，这是可行的。This is possible when the layout of child elements in the grid is similar to a ragged array as shown here. ![Windows 资源管理器视图显示未对齐的布局。] (~/add/media/uia-gridpattern-ragged-array.PNG "Windows 资源管理器视图显示未对齐的布局。")![Windows Explorer view showing ragged layout.](~/add/media/uia-gridpattern-ragged-array.PNG "Windows Explorer view showing ragged layout.") 坐标为空的 Grid 控件的示例Example of a Grid Control with Empty Coordinates ## Examples 在下面的示例中，侦听器声明以跟踪网格容器内的网格项的遍历。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. 项目属性将回显到控制台每次焦点更改事件时。Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus change event. [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#102)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

exception.span: 请求的行坐标大于 或列坐标大于 。

span.span: The requested row coordinate is larger than the or the column coordinate is larger than the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 模式标识符传递到方法，如若要从指定检索控件模式感兴趣的。The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，从 UI 自动化元素获取控件模式。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from a UI Automation element. remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在以下示例中，对返回的自动化元素的子代的根并符合一组属性条件的集合的函数传递根元素。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of automation elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. 此示例检索支持的 UI 自动化元素但当前在树中具有只有一项。This example retrieves the UI Automation elements that support but currently have only one item in the tree.
